summary: The clitoris is a female sex organ, located on the vulva. It is often considered the most sensitive part of a woman's body and is crucial for sexual pleasure. This complex structure has many nerve endings, making it highly responsive. While its main function is to provide pleasure, it has been a topic of much discussion in science and society, often surrounded by misconceptions and cultural taboos. Despite its importance, many people lack knowledge about the clitoris, especially compared to male anatomy.
title: Clitoris
